author: Dawn Alexander
title: Dawn Alexander
text:
tanvir kumar
Comment : Fantastic, This is the best thing I have done this year (in fact for quite a few years) This man was brilliant. WOW impressive is not a big enough word and he taught me lots in the process. Thank you for giving me back my laptop, that I no longer have any problems with.
